company.title: Chibifire.com (Pronounced as chee-bee-fire)
company.description: Meet Ernest (iFire) Lee, a passionate developer based in Canada. Specializing in emerging technologies like game engines, particularly the Godot Engine, he plays a pivotal role in maintaining its glTF 3D pipeline. This includes managing both exporting and importing functionalities. He also works closely with the OMIGROUP to ensure metaverse interoperability and maintain an importer for the portable avatar format VRM in the Godot Engine.

history.header:
CSG Manifold Integration: Enabled robust mesh boolean operations in Godot 4.4 through collaboration with the Manifold team, reducing codebase from 300k to 20k lines.
Native FBX Support: Implemented ufbx importer in Godot 4.3 with Samuli Raivio for seamless open-source FBX workflows.
Godot IREE: Coordinated ntegration for executing pre-trained machine learning models within the engine.
glTF2 Scene Exporter: Revolutionized Godot's 3D asset interoperability with industry-standard export capabilities.
Godot Engine | Core 3D Pipeline Coordinator (Animation/Import Systems) | 2017–Present
